Document summary: Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) for As-Available Energy between Kauai Island Utility Cooperative and Kapaa Solar LLC. The document outlines the terms, conditions, and obligations of both parties in the purchase and sale of electric energy. It addresses issues such as indemnification, insurance, conditions precedent, and warranties to ensure a reliable and legally compliant energy transaction.
Suggested title v2: Aug-03-2010 Energy Purchase Agreement with Kapaa Solar (main)
